start.text: I don't want to waste any time. Let's end this quickly.
We need to make sound judgement in situations such as this.
If there's no opportunity to strike, we'll simply make one.
While we need to fight with all we have, it's not advised to push our ships farther beyond that.
Taunting the enemy over comms is unnecessary in combat.

start_boss.text: It will be naturally harder to aim for its weak points if you control your weapons too recklessly.
If there's no opportunity for us to break through, we'll make our own.

retreat.text: I do not want to witness any more death.
We must withdraw from the field of battle.
It's our fault we need to retreat.

out_of_missiles.text: We've run out of ammunition. Do not panic.
It is time to change our tactics. We have used all of our munitions.
Perhaps if we did not use our missiles so recklessly...

engaged.text: Crew, hasty actions will bring you more harm than good.
We must think and act quickly, most importantly of all.
It is unnecessary to taunt our opponent.

need_help.text: We require assistance. However, do not endanger yourselves.
A miscalculation. My crew needs aid.
I need your help, if it is not too much of a risk.

pursuing.text: Recklessly charging is not an efficient method of offense.
They are moving to withdraw. I suppose we must finish them off...
I do not want to waste any more of our time. Finish them.

running.text: My crew needs time to recover. Repositioning.

hull_90.text: Receiving minor damage. We must stay calm.
Our armor has been penetrated. If we panic, we've already lost.
They've broken through our defenses momentarily.
The ship is damaged. We are still capable.

hull_50.text: Requesting assistance. We are in significant danger.
We are in a bad situation. Do not lose your cool.

hull_30.text: There is no need to pity us.

overload.text: We've overloaded. Do not endanger yourself to cover us.

death.text: There is no need to take pity on me, commander...
Please do not panic, commander. I want you to stay focused on the battle.
It's entirely my fault that I've met such a fate.

victory.text: This isn't particularly delightful, I must say... Good work, nonetheless.
I frankly dislike how I am becoming numb to witnessing death.

victory_boss.text: Good work, crew. Repair immediate damage and retire to your quarters, for now.
